thread.section_title: WeddingWire Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WeddingWire | weddingwire.com
thread.title: Tracy Nachelle Davis
thread.title_full: WeddingWire reviewed by Tracy Nachelle Davis

author: Tracy Nachelle Davis
title: Tracy Nachelle Davis
text:
First off, the Budget Planning Tool was the reason I started using the website. I had a friend who'd recently gotten married tell me about the budget tool specifically, but after actually signing up for the website and seeing all the available information the help, I fell in love.
The website creation tool was easy to use and so cute. Very helpful as I didn't use response cards, but just had people RSVP through the website. The only thing I can say is that the website creation tool IS NOT easily compatible with Internet Explorer. That was a bit of a pain, but the rest was great.
I loved the checklist and the ability to change dates as well as add/remove items to the list. So helpful to stay on track. I didn't have a wedding planner, so it was great to have something that would gently lead me by the hand so I didn't forget anything.
The guest list tool was easy to use and made keeping track of RSVPs easy.
The budget tool was my best friend. You could add payments and when they were due. It really kept me in check.
I cannot say enough about how much thought has gone into making WeddingWire easy for couples to use! Thank you SO MUCH!
